subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthening national capacities, including civil societies on the consolidatio of democratic governance
subproject.description:
The main project outcome is to strengthen the rule of law in Guinea Bissau through justice and security services more focused on citizens needs. Project objectives are as follows: 

1.	Strengthen justice system institutions to ensure better protection of peoples rights and a quality delivery of services for the citizens
2.	Ensure access to justice for all, in particular women
3.	Security system reformed and modernized through a strengthened civilian governance management and oversight
4.	Police and Defence system modernized and adapted to the national financial context
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Renforcement Etat Droit

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthening national capacities, including civil societies on the consolidatio of democratic governance
subproject.description:
RoLS prioritises three key areas: i) Decentralisation of the justice system and access to justice; ii) Judicial training and mentoring; iii) Strategic planning, coordination and oversight of the justice and security systems.  Rols has three main outputs

1.	Access to Justice and Justice Service Delivery at the Regional Level improved
2.	Skills and Competencies of Justice Sector Actors Enhanced
3.	Justice and Security Sector Coordination and Governance Enhanced
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengthening  Rule of Law
